record.description: Arthur L. H. Rubin, director of the Institute of Military Studies, outlines for Berwanger the site of next March's tactical exercise in Palos Park. Maps showing strategic positions and military objectives guide the opposing forces in their simulated war. It applies in practice the lessons learned during the 10-week period of instruction.
